fields.summary: CLI: Display actual version of installed SDKs with "ti info -t ios" and "ti sdk list"

comments.body:
Verified using:

Windows 8.1, Mac OSX 10.10.5
Appc Core 5.0.2-19
Appc NPM 4.2.0
Ti SDK 5.0.1.v20150922104152


When running appc ti sdk list the output is now like the below, listing the name of the SDKs folder and then the SDK version separately 

{code}
5.0.1.test             5.0.1.v20150922104152  C:\ProgramData\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\5.0.1.test
5.0.0.v20150915230722  5.0.0.v20150915230722  C:\ProgramData\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\5.0.0.v20150915230722
